# Security Policy

## Reporting a Vulnerability

If you discover a security vulnerability, please report it responsibly:

1. Do not open a public issue
2. Contact the maintainers directly via email or private message
3. Provide detailed information about the vulnerability
4. Allow reasonable time for a fix before public disclosure

## What to Include

When reporting a vulnerability, please include:
- Description of the vulnerability
- Steps to reproduce
- Potential impact
- Suggested fix (if available)

## Response Time

We will acknowledge receipt of your vulnerability report within 72 hours and provide an estimated timeline for a fix.

## Disclosure Policy

- Security issues will be addressed as quickly as possible
- We will coordinate public disclosure with reporters
- Credit will be given to reporters upon request

Thank you for helping keep this project secure.
